name: TelehealthEmergencyDepartmentOrInitialInpatient
title: Telehealth Emergency Department or Initial Inpatient
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent telehealth consultations in emergency department or for initial inpatient.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with telehealth consultation in emergency department or for initial inpatient.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
